headings.title: Work XP
headings.greeting: Hello again! I'm Kelvin, and I'm a 2020 Mechatronics grad from the University Of Waterloo. Checkout my work experience below!

sapient.jobDesc1: Worked with client to transflistAEM, converting 60+ campaigns
sapient.jobDesc2: Developed tools for the quick creation of email campaigns, building components within AEM
sapient.jobDesc3: Built a shopping list POC web app for navigating a store with COVID guidelinesS
sapient.tools: React, Spring, Azure, Node, MongoDB, AEM/AES
